channel.title: Efficiency on 路边的阿不
channel.description: Recent content in Efficiency on 路边的阿不

item.title: Base64编码在「Apple快捷指令」中的妙用
item.description: Learn how to harness the power of Base64 encoding to insert attachments into Apple Shortcuts actions, boosting the efficiency and functionality of your daily errands beyond the obvious.

item.title: 「Apple快捷指令」 - 数据自动保存至Numbers
item.description: Sharing a commonly used Apple Shortcut, the Fueling Record. Catered for those who crave efficiency, this function simplifies fueling record processes. No need for separate apps or manual tracking. Hope these shortcuts can facilitate your life too.
